Package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.web.filters

package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.web.filters
Filters for the SAML Identity Provider.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Saml2AuthnRequestProcessingFilter
    A Filter that processes SAML AuthnRequest messages.
    Saml2ErrorResponseProcessingFilter
    A Filter responsible of sending SAML error response messages.
    Saml2IdpMetadataEndpointFilter
    A Filter that processes requests to download the Identity Provider's metadata.
    Saml2UserAuthenticationProcessingFilter
    A Filter that intercept an SAML authentication request that has been verified and translated into a Saml2UserAuthenticationInputToken.
